title: Amna Baloch, Finnish envoy discuss ties
content:
BRUSELLS, Jan 19 (APP): Ambassador of Pakistan to Belgium, Luxembourg and the European Union Amna Baloch Friday met here with Permanent Representative of Finland to European Union Markku Kein√§nen.
They discussed matters of regional and global importance and strengthening of engagements of Pakistan and Finland.
She also met with Barbara Dietrich, CEO of Diplomatic World Magazine and held interesting exchange of views on role of media in diplomacy.
